when_to_say: Used to refer to any edible item.
example: الطعام لذيذ هنا. (al-ta'am ladhidh huna.) - The food is delicious here.

when_to_say: Used to refer to drinking water.
example: أريد كأس ماء. (urid ka's maa'.) - I want a glass of water.

when_to_say: Used to refer to the beverage tea.
example: أشرب الشاي في الصباح. (ashrab al-shai fi al-sabah.) - I drink tea in the morning.

when_to_say: Used to refer to bread or baked goods.
example: أحتاج خبز للإفطار. (ahtaj khubz lil'iftar.) - I need bread for breakfast.
الفواكه صحية جدا. (al-fawakih sihiyya jiddan.) - Fruits are very healthy.

when_to_say: Used to refer to animal flesh as food.
example: أحب لحم الغنم. (uhibb lahm al-ghanam.) - I like lamb meat.

when_to_say: Used to refer to fish as food.
example: سمك مشوي لذيذ. (samak mashwi ladhidh.) - Grilled fish is delicious.

when_to_say: Used to describe the seasoning salt.
example: أضف قليل من الملح. (adaf qalil min al-milh.) - Add a little salt.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a plate or a meal.
example: هذا طبق رئيسي. (hatha tabaq rayisi.) - This is a main dish.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a dining establishment.
example: المطعم مزدحم الآن. (al-mat'am muzdahem al-aan.) - The restaurant is crowded now.
